citations.narrative:
The contingency plan available for review at the time of inspection was dated February 2023, more than a year ago. The
plan must be reviewed at least annually to ensure that it continues to adequately address the requirements of this
subsection and the facility must maintain documentation of those annual reviews.
To be corrected by ensuring the facility's contingency plan is reviewed annually and maintaining documentation of the
annual reviews. Correct by April 25th, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The contingency plan available for review at the time of inspection was dated February 2023, more than a year ago. The 
plan must be reviewed at least annually to ensure that it continues to adequately address the requirements of this 
subsection and the facility must maintain documentation of those annual reviews. 
 
To be corrected by ensuring the facility's contingency plan is reviewed annually and maintaining documentation of the 
annual reviews. Correct by April 25th, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
